00036         class US_API_EXPORT Params : public Object {
00037         public:
00041                 Params(void);
00042 
00046                 virtual ~Params(void);
00047 
00053                 int32 init(uint32 max_param_no, uint32 max_param_size);
00054 
00061                 int32 add(char* param);
00062 
00070                 char* operator[](uint32 index)
00071                 {
00072                         return (index < m_uParamsFound ? m_strParam[index] : NULL);
00073                 }
00074 
00079                 uint32 getCount(void)
00080                 {
00081                         return m_uParamsFound;
00082                 }
00083 
00087                 void reset(void)
00088                 {
00089                         m_uParamsFound = 0;
00090                 }
00091 
00098                 int32 setCommandName(char* cmdname)
00099                 {
00100                         return m_dbCmdName.xcopy(cmdname);
00101                 }
00102 
00107                 char* getCommandName(void)
00108                 {
00109                         return m_dbCmdName.toString();
00110                 }
00111         private:
00112                 /* copy constructor not available */
00113                 Params(Params&)
00114                         : Object(UOSUTIL_RTTI_PARAMS)
00115                 {
00116                 }
00117 
00118                 /* command name */
00119                 DataBuf m_dbCmdName;
00120 
00121                 /* ptr to a string ptrs array */

00123

00126

00128                 uint32 m_uMaxParamsNo;
00129

00131                 uint32 m_uMaxParamSize;

00139         class US_API_EXPORT Command : public CallBack {
00140         public:
00141                 /*
00142                  * Friend classes.
00143                  */
00144                 friend class Interp;
00145 
00149                 Command(void);
00150 
00154                 virtual ~Command(void);
00155 
00163                 int32 init(
00164                         char* name, // command name
00165                         uint32 min_pc, // minimum acceptable parameters count
00166                         uint32 max_pc, // maximum acceptable parameters count
00167                         void* context   // generic user data pointer
00168                 );
00169 
00174                 bool isEnabled(void)
00175                 {
00176                         return m_bEnabled;
00177                 }
00178 
00183                 void setEnabled(bool flag)
00184                 {
00185                         m_bEnabled = flag;
00186                 }
00187 
00193                 bool checkParamsCount(uint32 count)
00194                 {
00195                         if (count < m_uMinParamsCount || count> m_uMaxParamsCount)
00196                                 return false;
00197 
00198                         return true;
00199                 }
00200 
00205                 char* getSyntax(void)
00206                 {
00207                         return m_dbSyntax.toString();
00208                 }
00209 
00215                 int32 setSyntax(char* syntax)
00216                 {
00217                         return m_dbSyntax.xcopy(syntax);
00218                 }
00219 
00224                 char* getDescription(void)
00225                 {
00226                         return m_dbDesc.toString();
00227                 }
00228 
00234                 int32 setDescription(char* desc)
00235                 {
00236                         return m_dbDesc.xcopy(desc);
00237                 }
00238 
00239         protected:
00248                 virtual int32 makeParams(Params* p, char* instr_string);
00249 
00257                 virtual int32 perform(Params*, void*)
00258                 {
00259                         return SUCCESS;
00260                 }
00261 
00262         private:
00263                 /* copy constructor not available */
00264                 Command(Command&)
00265                 {
00266                 }
00267 
00268                 /* user data this callback works on */
00269                 void* m_voidCtx;
00270 
00271                 /* flag: command enabled or disabled */
00272                 bool m_bEnabled;
00273 
00274                 /* minimum acceptable parameters count */
00275                 uint32 m_uMinParamsCount;
00276 
00277                 /* maximum acceptable parameters count */

00279 
00280                 /* command syntax string */
00281                 DataBuf m_dbSyntax;
00282 
00283                 /* command description string */
00284                 DataBuf m_dbDesc;
00285

00287                 DataBuf m_dbWork;
